name: CaptainQ's Nextbots
description:
A game heavily inspired by gmod where you get chased by loud png's current nextbots: obunga, quandale dingle, yoshi, selene delgado, baldi, laughing emoji, amogus, mc intruder, sponge, vibe check, nerd

Controls:

Up, Down Arrows / W And S = Move Up And Down

 Left And Right Arrows = Turn Around 

A And D = Move Left And Right 

M = Open/Close Map (I Recommend to open the map since it makes the game easier to play)
